title: Thanks!!!  Need only Cobb - Green and Foster in PSA 5!
author: mansco

posts.post_title: Thanks!!!  Need only Cobb - Green and Foster in PSA 5!
posts.post_content:
I'd like to thank Mike Ryan, Scot Reader, Bill Brodhead, Bill Latzko, Pete Gustafson, and Kevin Mize for their help in getting me down to almost completing my objective of putting together a T206 set (minus the Big Four) in PSA 5.

I am now down to needing 2 cards:

Ed Foster, one of the elusive Southern Leaguer, and,

Ty Cobb - Green Portrait, one of the more expensive non-Big Four T206s.

If I am lucky, I will be finished this year.

Thanks, again.
I wish I had one to sell you just to say I helped. Good luck!

Mark,

Thanks for the gesture.  Now that I think about it, donations will be accepted so I can pick up the Cobb when one comes up.  (I'm afraid I am going to have to settle for something less than a 5 like I did for O'Hara and Demmitt).
What grade are your O'Hara & Demmitt? And how long did it take you to get to 518?

So all besides those 2 are all in PSA 5...If that's the case, the value of what you had to assemble, a green Cobb PSA 5 should be a drop in the bucket..No need to settle for less..Nice job with the completion..Would like to fill my wall with all of them..haha
